item.description:
Start the summer the right way, with a song! Or 2, or 3!

The Wave has offered us use of space for Karaoke-do warm-up prior to karaoke. We'll stretch, breathe, vocalize, and socialize, of course. I hope to get us advance access to the songbooks so we can do some song selection and be ready to sing when karaoke starts. We'll start our warm-up at 8; karaoke starts at 9.

There are so many fun songs about summertime! Choose one of those, or sing "The 12 Days of Christmas". Just come sing! Come show The Wave that this is what we like!

group.name: Karaoke-Do: Personal Growth through Public Exposureâ„¢

item.name: Sing in Summertime!
